description.text: This spell functions like lesser planar ally, except that you may call a single creature of 18 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 18. The creatures agree to help you and request your return payment together.

sections.Components: V, S, M (offerings worth 2,500 plus payment), DF
sections.School: conjuration (calling) [see text for lesser planar ally]
